Cont Mdladla Mhlanga bụ onye Zimbabwe na-ede egwuregwu (1957/1958 - 3 Ọnwa asatọ 2022),  onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri. Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere ma bụrụ onye isi nke ụlọ ọrụ Amakhosi Theatre Productions, nke e guzobere n'afọ 1982.
Ọ bụ onye na-akatọ ọchịchị Robert Mugabe, a na-ejide ya ugboro ugboro maka nkwupụta echiche ya n'ihu ọha
Ya, ya na onye Burmese satirist Zarganar na City of Rhyme - otu hip-hop siri ike iri na anọ si n'ebe ugwu Brazil, nke okwu ya katọrọ ime ihe ike - bụ ndị mmeri nke Freedom to Create Prize n'afọ 2008.
